story.title: Our Story
story.p1:
High As A Kite was born from a simple desire: to share the magic of the Peruvian coast with the world. What started as a small group of friends chasing wind has grown into a premier kitesurfing academy.

We believe that the ocean is the best classroom. Over the years, we've refined our teaching methodology to ensure that every student, regardless of their starting point, can experience the thrill of harnessing the wind. Our base in Northern Peru offers some of the most consistent conditions on the planet, making it the perfect place to start your journey.

theSpot.title: The Spot: Santo Domingo
theSpot.description: Our school operates in Paracas Bay, specifically in the Santo Domingo area. It is a world-class spot known for its safety and consistency.

features.title: Flat Water
features.desc: A huge natural pool with no waves, ideal for learning and perfecting freestyle tricks.

features.title: The 'Paracas' Wind
features.desc: Famous for its intensity. The thermal wind kicks in strong from noon until sunset (20-30 knots).

features.title: Sandy Bottom
features.desc: No rocks or underwater hazards. Progressive depth makes learning easy.

features.title: National Reserve
features.desc: Ride surrounded by desert and marine wildlife in a spectacular protected environment.

gettingThere.title: How to Get There
gettingThere.bus: Bus: The most common option. Companies like Cruz del Sur and Oltursa depart daily from Lima (Javier Prado). The trip takes approx. 3.5 hours.
gettingThere.car: Car: Take the Panamericana Sur highway to km 245. It's a highway almost the entire way. Estimated time: 3 hours.

accommodation.title: Where to Stay

accommodation.budget: Budget/Social: Kokopelli Hostel, Selina (ideal for digital nomads and young vibes).

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: At Haak (hereinafter, 'we'), we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website and contact form.

infoCollected.title: 1. Information We Collect
infoCollected.content: Currently, we only collect information that you voluntarily provide to us through our contact form, which may include:
list: Any other data you include in your message.

purpose.title: 2. Purpose of Data Use
purpose.content: We use your personal data exclusively for the following purposes:
list: Responding to your request: To answer your questions, quotes, or messages sent through the form.

Marketing Communications: If you have given your explicit consent (by checking the corresponding box on the form), we will use your email to send you news, promotions, or relevant information about our services.

cookies.title: 3. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: This website does not use third-party cookies for advertising or behavioral tracking purposes. However, the technological platform on which the site is built may use essential technical cookies to ensure the proper functioning and security of the page.

sharing.title: 4. Sharing Information with Third Parties
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to outside parties. This does not include website hosting partners and other parties who assist us in operating our website, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, rectify, cancel, or oppose the processing of your data. If you wish to unsubscribe from our marketing list or request the deletion of your data, you can do so at any time by sending an email through our contact form.

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us through our form on the main page.
